name: Friendquest (Bobinator133)
description:
[PRE-ALPHA DEMO] a game about walking and friendship

INCLUDES:

  • more than 0 friends to meet
  • at least 1 area
  • 3+ hilarious lines of well-written dialogue
  • friendo
  • over 5 quirky characters
  • the ability to move
  • math
  • gun violence
  • it's a video game
  • Smeggle Johnson
  • doors
  • AND MOER!!11!11!!1!!!1!

WHY ARE U STILL HEAR PLAY NAOWE!!11!!!!@!!!@#@#$!@#$#vnq#*rUeM8PuTVBM(j:serw$j(TB0U-4

oh yeah also listen to the soundtrack here: Friendquest Demo OST | Bobinator133 (bandcamp.com)

and while you're at it join the oafishill discrod to report bugs and discuss the game: https://discord.gg/tr9fCHpjd7

(thanks to 16Bit_Felix for doing most of the character spritework; proper credits coming soon:tm:)

(heavily inspired by Tomb Of Friends by Zizou, among other things)
